EmailTemplate.name: Additional Documents Needed
EmailTemplate.subject: Axos Bank Inquiry {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
BofI Hello {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for your recent account application. Your application is currently under review. In order to proceed with the review process, please provide a copy of the following documents:
Primary Applicant Utility Bill Primary Applicant Driver’s License or State Issued ID Primary Applicant Social Security Card
We will ONLY accept the following utility bills as proof of address:
Water bill Electric bill Gas bill Landline bill
Each document must not be more than 30 days old or have a past due balance. It also must reflect the applicant's name and residential address on the application. Once your documents are received an Associate will contact you via email with an application decision within two (2) business days.
You can return your documents by the following means:
Upload a copy of the requested document(s) to your application Email to: customerservice@bofi.com Fax to: 858-350-0443 Mail to: Axos Bank P.O. Box 509127, San Diego, CA 92150-9948
Please note: There is no guarantee that we will be able to accept the documents you submit, however, please send us what you have and our Enrollment Specialists will make the final decision. If we require additional information we will contact you by email or telephone.
We hope to earn your business and commit to delivering value that will make Axos Bank your first choice for all your banking needs.
Best Regards,
{!User.FirstName} Axos Bank Customer Service
Personal Information at Account Opening - Federal law, including the USA PATRIOT Act, requires all financial institutions to obtain, verify and record information that identifies each person or business that opens an account. When you apply for a personal account, we will ask for your legal name, residential address, date of birth and Social Security Number (SSN). We will require one or more forms of unexpired photo identification. We may validate the information you provide to us to ensure we have a reasonable belief of your identity. If we are not able to verify your identity to our satisfaction, we will not open your account.
